snippet.title: SMG2 Cosmic Clones Challenge V2.1: Release - Hack by Laurozz
snippet.description:
The immense hack update is finally here!!!
Little Twist - Huge Changes - Complete Chaos

The hack consists of 29 carefully selected galaxies from the original game, with the addition of cosmic clones behind Mario in each mission; you would think it's a lazy hack, but you're wrong, you will be amazed for the amount of new content that is in this mod, just play and you'll see, one of the new things is that I made a lot of changes in each galaxy to make everything more spicy! In total, the game has 64 stars to collect, and some of them are really insane, so... I dare you to try completing the hack. How far will you get?

This version is completely different from the first one, I did my best to make it even more interesting, creative, fun and challenging!

-There are now lots of new comet missions!
-There are more galaxies with more changes, so new and creative stars!
-All the comet medals have been moved from their original position, some of them are placed in the second mission of the galaxy.
-A lot of layout and text have been changed, including characters with their own lines. Please talk with some of the NPCs!
-There is a completely new, long and epic world map!
-There are now more crazy boss battles with a bunch of cosmic clones behind you!
-Some checkpoints and Life Mushrooms have been removed.
-Now you can sometimes play as Luigi.
-Custom cosmic clones music! (Made by AJ DiSpirito: https://youtu.be/lR59DW6sOVA).

The entire hack is definitely a completely new experience! Doesn't matter if you've already played the first version, this one is really different, and if you haven't even played it, well, what are you waiting for!!??

I hope you like the hack and the update, have fun!!!

**
V2.1 Changes:
-Purple Stars and Grand Stars were added!!!
-I placed more checkpoints and edited other stuff to make the experience more balanced and comfortable.
-German translation was added (Thanks to mariokirby1703: https://www.youtube.com/c/mariokirby1703)
-Some details were added and bugs were fixed.
**

-The version 2.1.2 of the hack is here! I fixed, added and balanced a bunch of stuff.
-The version 2.1.4 is out, it's not a big deal, but I recomend it because it adds more NPCs dialogue.
-The version 2.1.5 is out, I changed some little things and fixed some stuff, so I recomend it

P.D. You need the cloudsuit for the small clouds section, it's not a cloudless challenge lol

*
If you play the hack and upload a gameplay in youtube please give me credits and put this trailer in the description of your video, thanks :)
*

*********
Information and DOWNLOAD:
https://gamebanana.com/mods/150988
*********

Iso Builder by Uupo03: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ag_TlPIXqEhfGlT5TOJJJgl4y0D69VAC/view?usp=sharing

Join to my Discord Server: https://discord.gg/JYxJqXr
If you join, you will be able to find out about the updates that the hack will have, and about the different projects that I will carry out. You can talk about my hacks and other things there, and you can also get some fancy roles if you complete this mod!

Gameplay recorded by LukasYT: https://www.youtube.com/c/LukasYT_thereal
And mariokirby1703: https://www.youtube.com/c/mariokirby1703

Thanks to mariokirby1703 for all the help he gave me:
-Purple stars making
-German Translation
-Gamplay recordings
-Balancing advices for the hack
-Other stuff

Thanks to Silver for helping me so much to make the hack more balanced and fair:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8tZX_7cuyF_0ZVlm8mVcuw
(Also, he was the first one completing the hack, and that's really sick, congrats)

Purple Grand Star made by GamingAndPrograming:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCkgiWwveeI1H5hhiHD4__Q

Thanks to Fer Chapa for the video editing and the thumbnail making.

Thanks to me for making the Logo and testing lol.

Cosmic Clones Remix made by AJ DiSpirito: 
https://youtu.be/lR59DW6sOVA
It was used in the start of the video and in the hack.

The other song used in the trailer is Levitating by Dua Lipa: https://youtu.be/TUVcZfQe-Kw


Thanks for watching uwu
